para: This option controls whether to include the Ground Speed (GSP) data from the IGC file.

This is a boolean option that is enabled by default. While the IGC specification does not define the units for this value, GPSBabel assumes it to be in kilometers per hour (km/h). This data is included by default as it is a standard component of track data.
To exclude this data, use GSP=0.

example.title: Convert an IGC file while excluding the Ground Speed data
